attr.title: LISA: The Pointless
attr.desc: LISA: The Pointless is a fangame set in the LISA universe made by Edvinas Kandrotas. It's in equal parts a story about a garbage man trying to run away from the world and the story of that very world he is trying to escape.
attr.desc_md: LISA: The Pointless is a fangame set in the LISA universe made by Edvinas Kandrotas. It's in equal parts a story about a garbage man trying to run away from the world and the story of that very world he is trying to escape.
attr.inst:
download the game from gamejolt,https://gamejolt.com/games/lisa-the-pointless/221705 tested with Windows version. Copy all assetsto the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
attr.inst_md:
Download the game from [GameJolt](https://gamejolt.com/games/lisa-the-pointless/221705) (tested with Windows version). Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

**Note:** This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
